about.title: About Breizhsport
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner in Breton sports equipment since 2014

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2014, Breizhsport was born from a passion for Breton sports and a desire to preserve and promote our rich sporting heritage. What started as a small local shop has grown into Brittany's leading supplier of traditional sports equipment.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We source and provide only the highest quality sports equipment.

community.title: Community

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to your questions

time.question: What are the delivery times?
time.answer: Delivery is usually made within 2-4 business days in metropolitan France.

cost.question: How much does shipping cost?
cost.answer: Shipping costs are calculated based on the chosen delivery method and your address.

policy.question: What is your return policy?
policy.answer: You have 30 days to return an item. The item must be in its original condition.

process.question: How do I make a return?
process.answer: Log into your account, select the relevant order and follow the instructions to generate a return label.

size.question: How do I choose the right size?
size.answer: Check our size guide available on each product page to find the size that best suits you.

stock.question: An item is out of stock, when will it be available again?
stock.answer: Restocking times vary by product. You can sign up for stock alerts to be notified as soon as the item is available again.

methods.question: What payment methods are accepted?
methods.answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), PayPal and bank transfers.

security.question: Are payments secure?
security.answer: Yes, all our payments are secured with SSL encryption and we comply with PCI DSS security standards.
